ComicInfo.Summary:
The time-twisting conclusion of the Thirteenth Doctor's first comic adventure, from Eisner-nominated writer Jody Houser (Faith, Mother Panic, Stranger Things)! Illustrated by award-winning artist Rachael Stott (Doctor Who) and colorist Enrica Angiolini (Shades of Magic)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Giorgia Sposito & Arianna Florean | 1 | B | Cover B | Photo | 2 | C | Cover C | Rachael Stott | 3 | D | Gallifreyan High Council Cover D | Rachael Stott | 4-5 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 06:09:17. [CVDB700108] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 07:36:54. [Issue ID 1921141]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Arianna Florean,Enrica Eren Angiolini,Viviana Spinelli,Enrica Eren Angiolini
ComicInfo.Letterer: John G Roshell,Richard Starkings,Sarah Jacobs,Sarah Jacobs,John Roshell,Richard Starkings,Comicraft
